item.description:
9.8 UPDATE: The sun is shinning up here, weather report say's we will get rain, BUT after we have a great night out with friends, laughter, food, mini golf and ice cream!!!!  See you all at 5:30!

9.7.12 UPDATE: Hey everyone, I am keeping an eye on the weather, looks like the rain, is going to stay to the West of us (yippppeeee).  Check back here at 3:30 tomorrow afternoon I will update the site at that time.  Thank you!

 

Come on out to Captain's Corner where everything is right there ready for us to enjoy.... First: dinner at Lena's Seafood, after dinner we will head over to play mini "glow" golf, after that we can do either the batting cages or Go Karts, then lastly we will walk across the street to Hodgies for an ice cream.

So come on out to Captain's Corner for some summertime fun with friends.

We'll only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

If you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

 

We looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the parking lot.
item.name: Lena's, Mini golf and Ice Cream
